text: Kare-ra wa, ten to ji o sozo sa reta arra ga, kare-ra to onajiyona mono o, tsukuru koto ga dekiru no ga wakaranai no ka. Mata kare-ra no tame ni, kare wa ichi kigen o sadame rareta. Soreni utagai no yochi wa nai nodearu. Soredemo fugi no to wa, fushinjin hitosuji ni (sono ukeire o) kyohi suru
